overview: I Am Winter was selected by Pinewood Studios and Liftoff Sessions and Cannes Film Festival 2021. I Am Winter was a poem turned into a short film exploring the experience of being the victim of severe and brutal narcissistic abuse in a lesbian relationship. The film shows the despair, the anger, the rage and sadness, the inability to exist or escape from the same four walls. She is trapped, and she is dying.
title: I Am Winter
